priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C193274

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 Test Code Terminology

definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 test code.
name: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - In general, would you say your health is.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - In General You Say Your Health Is
synonyms: KDQ1-In General You Say Your Health Is

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - Does your health now limit you in these activities? If so, how much: Moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Limit Moderate Activities

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - Does your health now limit you in these activities? If so, how much: Climbing several flights of stairs.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Limit Climbing Several Flights

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Accomplished less than you would like.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Physical: Accomplished Less

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Were limited in the kind of work or other activities.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Physical: Limited Kind of Work

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious): Accomplished less than you would like.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Emotional: Accomplished Less

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious): Didn't do work or other activities as carefully as usual.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Emotional: Did Work Less Carefully

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work (including both work outside the home and housework)?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Pain Interfere With Normal Work

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt calm and peaceful?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful
synonyms: KDQ1-Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you have a lot of energy?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Did You Have a Lot of Energy
synonyms: KDQ1-Did You Have a Lot of Energy

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt downhearted and blue?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - You Felt Downhearted and Blue

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities (like visiting with friends, relatives, etc.)?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Time Physical or Emotional Interfered

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How true or false is each of the following statements for you: My kidney disease interferes too much with my life.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Kidney Disease Interferes With Life

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How true or false is each of the following statements for you: Too much of my time is spent dealing with my kidney disease.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Time Spent Deal With Kidney Disease
synonyms: KDQ1-Time Spent Deal w/ Kidney Disease

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How true or false is each of the following statements for you: I feel frustrated dealing with my kidney disease.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Frustrated Deal With Kidney Disease

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How true or false is each of the following statements for you: I feel like a burden on my family.
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - I Feel Like a Burden on My Family
synonyms: KDQ1-I Feel Like a Burden on My Family

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Soreness in your muscles?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Soreness in Muscles

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Chest pain?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Chest Pain

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Cramps?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Cramps

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Itchy skin?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Itchy Skin

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Dry skin?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Dry Skin

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Shortness of breath?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Shortness of Breath

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Faintness or dizziness?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Faintness or Dizziness

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Lack of appetite?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Lack of Appetite

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Washed out or drained?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Washed Out or Drained
synonyms: KDQ1-Bothered by Washed Out or Drained

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Numbness in hands or feet?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Numbness in Hands or Feet

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: Nausea or upset stomach?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Nausea or Upset Stomach

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: (Hemodialysis patient only) Problems with your access site?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Problems With Access Site
synonyms: KDQ1-Bothered by Problems w/ Access Site

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent were you bothered by each of the following: (Peritoneal dialysis patient only) Problems with your catheter site?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bothered by Problems Catheter Site

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Fluid restriction?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Fluid Restriction

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Dietary restriction?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Dietary Restriction

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Your ability to work around the house?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Ability to Work Around House
synonyms: KDQ1-Bother Ability to Work Around House

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Your ability to travel?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Your Ability to Travel

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Being dependent on doctors and other medical staff?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Dependent on Doctors and Staff

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Stress or worries caused by kidney disease?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Stress Caused by Disease

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Your sex life?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Your Sex Life

terms.definition: Kidney Disease and Quality of Life-36 Version 1 - How much does kidney disease bother you in each of the following areas: Your personal appearance?
terms.preferredTerm: KDQOL-36 Version 1 - Bother Your Personal Appearance
